title: The Guild
creator_credit: Kristin Ingram, Greg Aronowitz and Jeff Winkler
brief_description: The Guild is an American comedy web series created and written by Felicia Day, who also stars as Cyd Sherman. It premiered on YouTube on July 27, 2007.

constellations_other.name: Music and fandom
constellations_other.description: Sometimes fans create their own amazing artworks.

creator_credit_for_label: Kristin Ingram, Greg Aronowitz and Jeff Winkler
description: Fantasy and reality collide when a surprisingly diverse group of online video-game addicts struggle to balance the game with personal relationships.
description_for_label: Fantasy and reality collide when a surprisingly diverse group of online video-game addicts struggle to balance the game with personal relationships.
